# QobuzApiService.IsAppSecretValid method

Check if the App Secret is valid by trying to fetch the streaming URL for the track with id 7398. User must be logged in before testing App Secret.

```csharp
public bool IsAppSecretValid()
```

## Return Value

bool indicating if the API returned a valid response
